about.title: About Silk & Sage
about.subtitle: Bridging Eastern Wisdom and Modern Living

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.text: Silk & Sage is dedicated to helping you discover the perfect alignment between your personality, spiritual essence, and lifestyle choices. We believe that true wellbeing comes from understanding yourself deeply and making intentional choices that resonate with your inner nature.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.text: A world where ancient Eastern wisdom intersects seamlessly with contemporary living—where every choice, from the clothes you wear to the space you inhabit, reflects your authentic self and supports your holistic wellbeing.

items.title: Authenticity
items.description: We celebrate diversity and encourage you to embrace your unique personality and spiritual essence without compromise.

items.title: Wisdom
items.description: Drawing from thousands of years of Eastern philosophy, we synthesize traditional knowledge with modern psychology and wellness science.

items.title: Intentionality
items.description: We believe in conscious living—making deliberate choices that align with your values, personality, and the five elements.

items.title: Inclusivity
items.description: Our content serves everyone: MBTI enthusiasts, zodiac believers, Taoist philosophy practitioners, and anyone seeking deeper self-understanding.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We promote mindful consumption and timeless aesthetics that transcend fast trends, honoring both nature and quality.

items.title: Community
items.description: We foster a supportive space where people share insights, discoveries, and the joy of conscious living.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do
whatWeDo.intro: Silk & Sage is your personal guide to comprehensive self-discovery and mindful living.

services.title: Inner Element Quiz
services.description: Discover which of the five Eastern elements (Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, Water) resonates most with your personality. This ancient framework helps you understand your core energy and make lifestyle choices that balance and nurture it.

services.title: Personality-Aligned Content
services.description: Curated articles, guides, and recommendations tailored to your MBTI type and zodiac sign. From bedroom design to wardrobe choices, home organization to wellness practices—everything designed for YOUR unique constitution.

services.title: Mindful Curation
services.description: Hand-selected products, aesthetics, and practices that align with Eastern philosophy and modern minimalism. Quality over quantity, timelessness over trends.

services.title: Community Insights
services.description: Rate articles, share your experiences, and learn from others on similar journeys. Your feedback helps us improve and create more relevant content.

philosophy.heading: Our Philosophy
paragraphs: At Silk & Sage, we don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Your MBTI type, zodiac sign, and inner element are not boxes that limit you—they're lenses that help you see yourself more clearly.

The ancient Eastern concept of the five elements (Wuxing) suggests that all phenomena can be categorized into five fundamental energies: Wood (growth), Fire (transformation), Earth (stability), Metal (refinement), and Water (adaptability). Each person embodies these elements in unique proportions, and understanding this balance is key to wellbeing.

We combine this wisdom with modern personality frameworks like MBTI and the cosmic cycles of the zodiac to provide you with deeply personalized guidance. Whether you're redesigning your living space, building a conscious wardrobe, or seeking spiritual growth, we'll help you make choices that honor your authentic self.
In a world of endless noise and options, Silk & Sage is your calm sanctuary—a place to understand yourself deeply and live intentionally.

team.heading: Our Team
team.description: Silk & Sage was founded by individuals passionate about Eastern philosophy, wellness culture, and conscious living. We are designers, writers, wellness practitioners, and lifelong learners who believe in the transformative power of self-knowledge.

contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.text: Have questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries? We'd love to hear from you.

spring.name: Awakening
spring.psychology: Spring corresponds to the Wood element, symbolizing growth and hope. Soft, fresh colors help ease anxiety and spark creativity and new beginnings.

summer.name: Flourishing
summer.psychology: Summer corresponds to the Fire element, symbolizing passion and expression. Bright warm tones elevate energy levels and spark social desire and drive.

autumn.name: Harvest
autumn.psychology: Autumn corresponds to the Metal element, symbolizing harvest and order. Earth tones bring stability and security, helping with reflection and consolidation.

winter.name: Stillness
winter.psychology: Winter corresponds to the Water element, symbolizing wisdom and introspection. Cool tones create a tranquil atmosphere, supporting deep relaxation and inner reflection.

new_year.name: Lunar New Year
new_year.psychology: Red symbolizes celebration and energy, gold symbolizes prosperity. This high-energy color combination instantly elevates mood and brings festive joy.

explore.title: Explore Articles
explore.subtitle: Discover Eastern wisdom and lifestyle aesthetics tailored for you
